Package org.neo4j.logging.log4j

Class StructureAwareMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.logging.log4j.StructureAwareMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.logging.log4j.message.Message, org.apache.logging.log4j.util.StringBuilderFormattable, Neo4jLogMessage
    public abstract class StructureAwareMessage
extends Object
implements Neo4jLogMessage, org.apache.logging.log4j.util.StringBuilderFormattable
    Base class for supporting structured logging. This message type will be handled different by e.g. Neo4jJsonLogLayout, where asStructure(FieldConsumer) will be used to generate the output. If this message is received by any other layout, asString(StringBuilder) will be called.
    See Also:
